summary: The bill, titled the "Stop Taxpayer Funding of Hamas Act," aims to prohibit U.S. government funds from being used in the Gaza territory unless the President certifies to specific congressional committees that the funds will not benefit organizations or individuals associated with Hamas, Palestinian Islamic Jihad, or other designated foreign terrorist organizations. The bill also restricts funding through United Nations entities in Gaza, requiring certification that they are not promoting anti-Israel or anti-Semitic views.
